intent: User at Level 3 tries to post to Community Commons - blocked with mythic messaging

input.message: I want to share my insights about consciousness development in the Community Commons.

notes.whyGold: Shows Community Commons gate working: Level 4+ required, mythic dignity-holding messaging for those not yet eligible.
notes.keyPattern: Boundaries as developmental wisdom - 'you're close, keep engaging with complexity'
notes.mythicMessaging: Not 'access denied' but 'your current phase is essential - pattern recognition is emerging'
notes.architecturalSignificance: Second of three gates (Router, Commons, Field) - prevents premature public contribution
